queries.query: select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as v1 from encounter e, patient p where facility_id=:FACILITY: and e.patient_hid=p.patient_hid and e.patient_age_years >= 5 and e.patient_age_years < 15 and p.gender='M' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='inpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':ENC_DATE:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as v2 from encounter e, patient p where facility_id=:FACILITY: and e.patient_hid=p.patient_hid and e.patient_age_years >= 5 and e.patient_age_years < 15 and p.gender='F' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='inpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':ENC_DATE:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as v3 from encounter e, patient p where facility_id=:FACILITY: and e.patient_hid=p.patient_hid and e.patient_age_years >= 5 and e.patient_age_years < 15 and p.gender='M' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':ENC_DATE:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as v4 from encounter e, patient p where facility_id=:FACILITY: and e.patient_hid=p.patient_hid and e.patient_age_years >= 5 and e.patient_age_years < 15 and p.gender='F' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':ENC_DATE:';
